Class PlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.controller.PlayerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class PlayerController
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements Observer
    Controller in charge of managing players.

      • createPlayer

        public Player createPlayer(java.lang.String name,
                           PlayerColor color)
        Instances a new player with a name and color and adds it to the board.
        Parameters:
        name - the player's name.
        color - the player's color.
        Returns:
        the player instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the name is already used by another player in this board.
